ii_V_I_major.name: ii-V-I Major (Essential Jazz)
ii_V_I_major.theory: Most important jazz progression - establishes tonal center through subdominant-dominant-tonic motion
ii_V_I_major.evidence: Found in 80% of jazz standards (Real Book analysis)

ii_V_I_minor.name: ii-V-i Minor
ii_V_I_minor.theory: Minor version with half-diminished ii chord

tritone_substitution.name: Tritone Sub ii-V-I
tritone_substitution.theory: Substitutes V7 with bII7 (3 half-steps down) - shares same 3rd and 7th
tritone_substitution.evidence: Charlie Parker, Dizzy Gillespie standard technique

coltrane_changes.name: Coltrane Changes (Giant Steps)
coltrane_changes.theory: Key changes by major thirds - B, Eb, G tonal centers
coltrane_changes.evidence: Giant Steps (1960) - demonstrated advanced harmonic substitution

rhythm_changes.name: Rhythm Changes (I Got Rhythm)
rhythm_changes.theory: George Gershwin 32-bar AABA form - foundation of bebop

modal_dorian.name: Modal Dorian (So What)
modal_dorian.theory: Miles Davis modal jazz - stays in Dorian mode rather than functional harmony
modal_dorian.evidence: Kind of Blue (1959) - revolutionary modal approach

borrowed_chord_progression.name: Modal Interchange (Borrowed Chords)
borrowed_chord_progression.theory: Borrows chords from parallel minor (e.g., bVI and bVII in major key)

dilla_life.name: J Dilla 'Life' Progression
dilla_life.theory: Extended 9th chords with Dorian ii-V movement

neo_soul_classic.name: Neo-Soul Classic
neo_soul_classic.theory: Extended jazz chords with sus voicings

soulquarians_butter.name: Soulquarians Butter
soulquarians_butter.theory: 13th chords with sus voicings - Rhodes electric piano staple

donut_shop.name: Donut Shop Dreams
donut_shop.theory: Warm major progressions with suspended endings

slum_village.name: Slum Village Glow
slum_village.theory: Bright G major tonality with extended voicings

ethiojazz.name: Ethiojazz Nights
ethiojazz.theory: Ethiopian pentatonic scales with altered jazz voicings

ahmad_jamal.name: Ahmad Jamal 'Awakening'
ahmad_jamal.theory: Modal jazz with E major tonality

isley_brothers.name: Isley Brothers Style
isley_brothers.theory: Soul progressions in Gb major with lush voicings

organic_dilla.name: Organic Dilla (Randomized Per Render)
organic_dilla.theory: ii-V-I in Bb with organic parameter variation
organic_dilla.evidence: Research: Organic randomization for 'magical' analog drift

vinyl_soul.name: Worn Vinyl Soul
vinyl_soul.theory: Curtis Mayfield style with vinyl degradation
vinyl_soul.evidence: Vinyl crackle from SoX brownnoise generator (synth.c recursive low-pass)

flylo_space.name: Flying Lotus Cosmic
flylo_space.theory: Experimental modal harmony with deep modulation

blade_runner_dystopia.name: Blade Runner Dystopian Pads (CS-80)
blade_runner_dystopia.theory: Vangelis-style haunting atmosphere with suspended chords
blade_runner_dystopia.evidence: Blade Runner (1982) - CS-80 slow envelopes + detuned saws

shine_on_floyd.name: Pink Floyd Yearning Brass (Minimoog)
shine_on_floyd.theory: Minor seventh progression with brass-like pads
shine_on_floyd.evidence: Shine On You Crazy Diamond (1975) - Moog brass pads

pyramids_ocean.name: Frank Ocean Dreamy Oberheim
pyramids_ocean.theory: Modern R&B with lush analog warmth

industrial_techno_dilla.name: Industrial Techno x Dilla Soul
industrial_techno_dilla.theory: Dark minor progression with heavy bass emphasis
industrial_techno_dilla.evidence: Fusion: Detroit techno + J Dilla chord theory

modal_jazz.name: Modal Jazz
modal_jazz.theory: Modal movements with altered chord extensions

erykah_badu_on_and_on.name: Erykah Badu 'On & On'
erykah_badu_on_and_on.theory: Simple minor progression with major 7th color

madlib_yesterday_new_quintet.name: Madlib Yesterday's New Quintet
madlib_yesterday_new_quintet.theory: Jazz standard reharmonization with extended chords

modal_interchange_epic.name: Modal Interchange Epic Journey
modal_interchange_epic.theory: 16-chord progression using borrowed chords from parallel minor/major, chromatic mediants
modal_interchange_epic.evidence: Modal interchange: Bill Evans, Steely Dan, Radiohead

coltrane_extended.name: Coltrane Changes Extended
coltrane_extended.theory: Giant Steps-style major third modulations with extensions

neo_soul_extended.name: Neo-Soul Extended Vamp
neo_soul_extended.theory: Erykah Badu / D'Angelo style with extended voicings and suspensions

techno_hypnotic.name: Techno Hypnotic Loop
techno_hypnotic.theory: Minimal techno progression with suspended tonality
techno_hypnotic.evidence: Jeff Mills, Robert Hood - minimal Detroit techno

fusion_chromatic.name: Jazz Fusion Chromatic Descent
fusion_chromatic.theory: Herbie Hancock style with chromatic bass movement

hiphop_dark_epic.name: Hip-Hop Dark Minor Epic
hiphop_dark_epic.theory: Wu-Tang / Mobb Deep style minor key darkness with modal shifts

floating_melody.name: Floating Melody Sequence
floating_melody.theory: Suspended floating chords with stepwise voice leading
floating_melody.evidence: Neuroscience-backed: stepwise motion = mirror neuron pleasure

james_brown_vamp.name: James Brown Funk Vamp
james_brown_vamp.theory: Static funk - stays on one chord with rhythmic emphasis

curtis_mayfield_superfly.name: Curtis Mayfield 'Superfly'
curtis_mayfield_superfly.theory: Smooth soul with chromatic bass movement

herbie_hancock_chameleon.name: Herbie Hancock 'Chameleon'
herbie_hancock_chameleon.theory: Jazz-funk modal vamp over Bb minor pentatonic

marvin_gaye_inner_city.name: Marvin Gaye 'Inner City Blues'
marvin_gaye_inner_city.theory: Minor modal progression with gospel influences

vangelis_cs80_blade_runner.description: Haunting, expansive pads with wailing tones and deep emotion
vangelis_cs80_blade_runner.sox_approximation: synth 8 sawtooth 440 sawtooth 444 fade h 3 8 4 lowpass 600 chorus 0.7 0.9 50 0.4 0.25 2 -t reverb 50 delay 300 norm -2
vangelis_cs80_blade_runner.warmth_technique: Detuned oscillators + slow envelopes + sub-bass layer

jarre_oxygene_vcs3.description: Ambient, psychedelic pads with mysterious yet optimistic layers
jarre_oxygene_vcs3.sox_approximation: synth 10 triangle 330 sawtooth 334 fade h 3 10 5 lowpass 800 chorus 0.6 0.8 60 0.5 0.3 2 reverb 60 norm -2
jarre_oxygene_vcs3.warmth_technique: LFO pitch modulation for organic movement

pink_floyd_minimoog.description: Yearning, brass-like pads with wistful tone
pink_floyd_minimoog.sox_approximation: synth 8 sawtooth 220 square 223 fade h 1 8 4 lowpass 1200 overdrive 5 chorus 0.6 0.9 40 0.4 0.2 2 reverb 25 norm -2
pink_floyd_minimoog.warmth_technique: Brass filter envelope (quick decay) + light overdrive

vangelis_chariots_cs80.description: Evocative, romantic pads with resonant fanfares
vangelis_chariots_cs80.sox_approximation: synth 10 square 262 square 267 fade h 2 10 3 lowpass 900 reverb 45 delay 200 norm -2
vangelis_chariots_cs80.warmth_technique: Polyphonic aftertouch on filter + detuned pulse waves

visage_polymoog_vox.description: Iconic vocal-like pad, lush and ethereal
visage_polymoog_vox.sox_approximation: synth 12 sawtooth 330 sawtooth 335 sawtooth 340 fade h 2.5 12 4 bandpass 1500 3q phaser 0.8 0.7 3 0.6 0.5 reverb 40 norm -2
visage_polymoog_vox.warmth_technique: Heavy detuning (3 oscillators) + formant filtering for vocal quality

ultravox_solina_strings.description: Syrupy, lush string pads with emotional depth
ultravox_solina_strings.sox_approximation: synth 10 sawtooth 220 sawtooth 222 sawtooth 224 fade h 0.5 10 2 lowpass 3000 chorus 0.7 0.9 55 0.5 0.3 2 -t overdrive 3 norm -2
ultravox_solina_strings.warmth_technique: Built-in ensemble effect (3-voice chorus) + tape saturation

brian_eno_cs80_ambient.description: Celestial, ascending pads with minimalist warmth
brian_eno_cs80_ambient.sox_approximation: synth 15 sine 165 sawtooth 166 fade h 5 15 6 highpass 80 reverb 70 norm -2
brian_eno_cs80_ambient.warmth_technique: Ultra-slow envelopes (5s+ attack) + gentle LFO swell

tangerine_dream_moog_modular.sox_approximation: synth 12 sawtooth 110 fade h 1.5 12 3 lowpass 700 delay 400 0.6 delay 800 0.4 reverb 35 norm -2
tangerine_dream_moog_modular.warmth_technique: Analog sequencing with random voltage for organic variation

michael_jackson_cs80_strings.description: String-like chord pads, warm and spacious
michael_jackson_cs80_strings.sox_approximation: synth 4 sawtooth 330 sawtooth 334 fade h 0.3 4 2 lowpass 2500 reverb 30 norm -2
michael_jackson_cs80_strings.warmth_technique: Short attack for punchy entry + mid-range EQ emphasis

underworld_waldorf_wavetable.sox_approximation: synth 10 sawtooth 440 sawtooth 446 triangle 442 fade h 2 10 3.5 lowpass 1800 overdrive 6 reverb 55 norm -2

enya_d50_new_age.description: Spacious new-age pads with synthetic-yet-real tone
enya_d50_new_age.sox_approximation: synth 12 sine 440 triangle 441 sawtooth 442 fade h 1 12 3 lowpass 4000 chorus 0.8 0.9 70 0.6 0.35 2 -t reverb 60 norm -2
enya_d50_new_age.warmth_technique: LA synthesis (attack samples + sustain loops) + heavy chorus

japan_system700_minimal.description: Haunting, minimalist pads with dystopian tone
japan_system700_minimal.sox_approximation: synth 10 sawtooth 220 fade h 2.5 10 4 lowpass 500 reverb 20 norm -2
japan_system700_minimal.warmth_technique: Minimalist approach - focus on space between notes

frank_ocean_ob8_dreamy.description: Dreamy pads with analog polyphony warmth
frank_ocean_ob8_dreamy.sox_approximation: synth 12 sawtooth 330 sawtooth 335 fade h 1.5 12 3.5 lowpass 1500 chorus 0.7 0.85 48 0.5 0.28 2 reverb 50 norm -2
frank_ocean_ob8_dreamy.warmth_technique: Unison detune + shimmer reverb for lushness

van_halen_obx_brass.description: Brass-like pads, warm through amp distortion
van_halen_obx_brass.sox_approximation: synth 6 sawtooth 440 sawtooth 444 fade h 0.2 6 1.5 lowpass 2000 overdrive 12 reverb 25 norm -2
van_halen_obx_brass.warmth_technique: Guitar amp distortion for rock fusion + velocity sensitivity

general_warm_organic_recipe.description: Master recipe for lush, warm, organic pads
general_warm_organic_recipe.sox_approximation: synth 10 sawtooth {{freq}} sawtooth {{freq+detune}} triangle {{freq+detune/2}} fade h 2 10 3.5 lowpass 800 overdrive 3 chorus 0.65 0.88 45 0.45 0.25 2 reverb 40 bass +2 200 0.7s norm -2
general_warm_organic_recipe.warmth_technique: Layer 2-3 oscillators + boost low-mids (200-500Hz) + subtle LFO/random modulation + tape saturation

dilla_butter.description: J Dilla signature warm Rhodes sound
dilla_butter.characteristics: Medium attack, tight compression, vintage reverb

warm_tape.description: Analog tape saturation with room ambience
warm_tape.characteristics: Slow attack, gentle compression, warm character

lofi_dream.characteristics: Fast attack, heavy compression, dreamy reverb

analog_lush.characteristics: Moderate attack, soft compression, deep reverb

sp1200_crunch.characteristics: Digital aliasing, bass boost, treble cut, heavy compression

vinyl_worn.description: Heavily worn vinyl with crackle, warps, and roll-off
vinyl_worn.sox_chain: highpass 60 lowpass 10000 compand 0.1,0.2 -inf,-60,-50,-20 -5 -90 0.1 tremolo 0.3 0.15 gain -3 norm -2
vinyl_worn.characteristics: Frequency roll-off (60Hz-10kHz), light saturation, wow-flutter, vinyl crackle
vinyl_worn.evidence: Research: SoX synth.c brownnoise algorithm - recursive low-pass filtering

vinyl_clean.description: Clean vinyl with subtle surface noise
vinyl_clean.characteristics: Wide bandwidth (30Hz-18kHz), subtle crackle, minimal compression

sp1200_authentic.characteristics: 26.04kHz sample rate, aggressive companding, aliasing via overdrive, treble roll-off
sp1200_authentic.evidence: SP-1200 hardware specs: 26.04kHz, 12-bit, 2.5s max sample time

dilla_magic_organic.description: Dilla butter with organic parameter randomization
dilla_magic_organic.characteristics: Variable saturation (5-15), variable room size (25-35), organic per-render variation
dilla_magic_organic.evidence: Research (Grok4): 'Scripting probabilistic effects for organic magic'

flylo_cosmic.description: Flying Lotus layered textures with deep modulation
flylo_cosmic.characteristics: Fast attack, heavy compression, dual chorus (layered), deep reverb, phase shifting
flylo_cosmic.evidence: Flying Lotus production: Cosmogramma (2010), layered synthesis aesthetic

jneiro_texture.sox_chain: compand 0.12,0.25 -inf,-65,-50,-25 -6 -90 0.15 overdrive 8 flanger 0.6 0.87 3.0 0.9 0.5 -t tremolo 4.5 70 reverb 35 55 85 norm -2
jneiro_texture.characteristics: Gritty overdrive, flanger movement, tremolo modulation, mid reverb
jneiro_texture.evidence: Jneiro Jarel: Shape of Broad Minds (2008), textured lo-fi aesthetic

evidence_based.source: arXiv 1904.03442 - Does it Swing? Microtiming Deviations
evidence_based.finding: Naturally fluctuating microtiming deviations are NOT essential for swing feel
evidence_based.implication: Consistent swing ratio more important than random microtiming
evidence_based.recommendation: Use fixed swing percentages rather than random timing jitter

dilla.description: J Dilla signature - golden ratio approximation

dilla_classic.name: J Dilla Classic Boom-Bap
dilla_classic.characteristics: Kick slightly ahead of beat, snare on 2 and 4, swung hi-hats

flylo_broken.name: Flying Lotus Broken Beat
flylo_broken.characteristics: Syncopated kicks, broken snare placement, rapid hi-hat rolls

madlib_dusty.name: Madlib Dusty Fingers
madlib_dusty.characteristics: Subtle swing, vintage feel, lower dynamics for lo-fi aesthetic

boom_bap_classic.name: Classic Boom-Bap (Premier/Pete Rock)
boom_bap_classic.characteristics: Straight quantization, heavy kick and snare, consistent hi-hat

trap_pattern.name: Modern Trap
trap_pattern.characteristics: 32nd note hi-hat rolls, syncopated kicks, crisp 808 snares

one_drop.name: One Drop (Roots Reggae)
one_drop.characteristics: Drop beat 1, emphasis on 3, swung hi-hats, rimshot on 3

rockers.name: Rockers (Sly & Robbie)
rockers.evidence: Sly & Robbie discography - 8th note kick analysis
rockers.characteristics: Steady 8th note kick, driving feel, more propulsive than one drop

steppers.name: Steppers (Four on Floor Reggae)
steppers.characteristics: Four on floor kick, higher tempo, energetic forward drive

detroit_techno_909.name: Detroit Techno (Derrick May / Juan Atkins)
detroit_techno_909.evidence: TR-909 programming guides from Belleville Three era
detroit_techno_909.characteristics: Aggressive 909 kick, open hats on upbeats, layered clap+snare

chicago_house.name: Chicago House (Frankie Knuckles)
chicago_house.characteristics: Four on floor, claps on 2&4, open hats on upbeats, disco influence

dub_techno.name: Dub Techno (Basic Channel / Rhythm & Sound)
dub_techno.evidence: Basic Channel discography - minimal techno analysis
dub_techno.characteristics: Subdued dynamics, layers of percussion, space and reverb focus

industrial_techno.name: Industrial Techno (Berghain Style)
industrial_techno.evidence: Berghain / Ostgut Ton analysis - aggressive techno programming
industrial_techno.characteristics: Off-beat kicks, 16th note hi-hats, tom percussion, hard dynamics

uk_garage.name: UK Garage (2-Step)
uk_garage.evidence: UK garage golden era (1999-2003) rhythm analysis
uk_garage.characteristics: Syncopated kicks, swung hi-hats, shuffled feel, intricate percussion

jazz_standard_swing.name: Jazz Standard Swing (Ride Pattern)
jazz_standard_swing.evidence: Bebop analysis - Art Blakey / Max Roach patterns
jazz_standard_swing.characteristics: Ride cymbal swing pattern, feathered kick, light snare comping

bossa_nova.name: Bossa Nova (João Gilberto Style)
bossa_nova.characteristics: Syncopated kick pattern, cross-stick rim, gentle dynamics
